appName.message: Linkover â€“ Info Tooltip on Hover for Links

appDescription.message: Shows info about the link on hover. Loads page title, thumbnail, description, URL and favicon

showOnlyWithModifierKey.message: Show only when modifier key is held (Ctrl, Shift, Alt etc)

mouseMoveDebounceTimeout.message: Timer to check element under cursor (ms)

mouseMoveDebounceTimeoutHint.message: Less value brings more responsiveness to mouse movement, but increases CPU and battery load

showOnlyWhenThreeDots.message: Show only if text contains three dots (...)

maxCursorSpeed.message: Max cursor speed allowed to trigger

changeColorForProccessedLinks.message: Highlight links which are being processed

keepShownOnMouseOut.message: Keep tooltip shown on mouse out (for debug)

showSiteNameInsteadOfUrl.message: Show site name instead of url

preventTooltipFromCoverLink.message: Prevent tooltip from covering the link

preventTooltipFromCoverLinkHint.message: When tooltip is set to be shown in one of screen corners, this option will move it to another side if it could cover the hovered link

whitelistDomainsHint.message: When at least one domain is specified, extension will run only on this domain, ignoring all others

followRedirectsHint.message: With this option enabled, extension will follow any link redirection and could reach and analyze more pages, but it imposes securiy risk and should be used with caution!
